item.title: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact character trailer – Razor
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/hunter-x-hunter-nen-x-impact-character-trailer-razor

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Greed Island Game Master.

Publishers Arc System Works and Bushiroad Games, and developer Eighting have released a new character trailer for Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact showcasing Razor (voiced by Takaya Kuroda).

Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025.

Watch the trailer below.

Razor Trailer

item.title: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete launches December 3
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/animal-crossing-pocket-camp-complete-launches-december-3

  • Smartphone

The paid, offline version of Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.

Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete will launch for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play on December 3, Nintendo announced. It will be available at an introductory price of $9.99 until January 31, 2025, after which the price will change to $19.99.

As previously announced, the free-to-play service-based game Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp will end shut down on November 29. Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete will be an offline, paid version of the game without any additional in-game purchases, featuring items and events that were released over the course of the game’s seven-year run.

Here is an overview of the Complete version, via its store pages:

About

The Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game was released in 2017. This one-time purchase app is packed with items and events that were released over the course of seven years. It keeps the general game play of Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp without additional in-game purchases.

You’ve become a campsite manager and it’s up to you to build a fun campsite.

While working as manager, you can also fish, catch bugs, chat with animals, and collect your favorite furniture.

Change into your favorite outfit, make lots of detours, and enjoy your relaxing camp life!

Key Features

  • Make Your Campsite With Over 10,000 Items – From tents and swings to lazy rivers and merry-go-rounds, there are tons of items you can use to decorate your campsite with to your taste.
  • Meet the Animals – A lot of animals with quirky personalities will make an appearance. The animals are very curious about your campsite. The animal who you choose as a camp caretaker will help you with your job. Build a wonderful campsite by walking around the forest together.
  • Tons of Seasonal Events – There will be lots of events such as Garden Events and Fishing Tourneys every month. Don’t forget Halloween, Toy Day, Bunny Day, and the Summer Festival. You can collect seasonal items if you work hard in these events.
  • Continue From Your Save Data – Players who played the Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp game can transfer their save data and continue playing. (Save data can be transferred until June 2, 2025.)

New Gameplay Added

  • Camper Cards – You can create a Camper Card, a card that introduces yourself. Pick a color and pose and it’s done. You can also scan other players’ Camper Cards and enjoy trading and collecting.
  • Everyone Gathers at the Whistle Pass – You can visit a new place that didn’t exist in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. Other players whose Camper Cards you registered will come visit. There will be live guitar performances too for you to enjoy music at night.
  • Complete Ticket – When you work hard in events, you can earn Complete Tickets. You can exchange them for limited edition items that you missed out on or fortune cookies of your choice.

Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete is packed with fun. Define your favorite lifestyle!

Miscellaneous

Although constant online connection is not required, temporary data communication may be required for the following processes, which may result in data communication usage.

  • Checking the account
  • Checking time
  • Downloading data

*Some events may not function properly if you change the time on your device.
*Save data will be saved onto your device.
*Please note that if you delete the app, save data will also be deleted.
*Operation is not guaranteed for all devices that meet the operating conditions. It may not work properly depending on the device’s performance and specifications, device-specific application usage conditions, etc.
*Some items from Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp may not be available.
*To transfer save data, you must link your Nintendo Account in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.

Watch a trailer below.

Welcome to Your New Home, Campers

English

Japanese

item.title: This Week’s Japanese Game Releases: Dragon Age: The Veilguard, Farmagia, more
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/this-weeks-japanese-game-releases-dragon-age-the-veilguard-farmagia-more

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered, Life is Strange: Double Exposure, etc.

Dragon Age: The Veilguard for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, and Farmagia for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC are the highlights of this week’s Japanese video game releases.

Also due out this week are Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered for PlayStation 5 and PC, Life is Strange: Double Exposure for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, Raiden NOVA for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC, and more.

Get the full list of this week’s Japanese game releases below. It should be noted that Gematsu will receive a small percentage of money from purchases made through Play-Asia links. You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU24” coupon code.

Physical and Digital

  • Clock Tower: Rewind (PS5, Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
  • Dragon Age: The Veilguard (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
    • Deluxe Edition (PS5)
    • North American Version
      • Standard Edition (PS5, Xbox Series)
      • Deluxe Edition (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
  • Farmagia (PS5, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • Collector’s Edition (Switch)
    • North American Version (PS5, Switch)
    • European Version
      • Standard Edition (PS5, Switch)
      • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)
    • Asian Version
      • Standard Edition (PS5, Switch)
      • Collector’s Edition (Switch)
  • The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story 2nd (PS4, Switch)
    • Limited Edition (PS4, Switch)
    • Special Box (PS4, Switch)
  • Ginsei IGO “AI” Teaches You How to Play Go (Switch)
  • Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5)
    • European Version (PS5)
    • Asian Version (PS5)
  • KEMCO RPG Selection Vol. 1 (PS5)
    • Asian Version (PS5)
  • KEMCO RPG Selection Vol. 8 (Switch)
    • Asian Version (Switch)
  • Life is Strange: Double Exposure (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • Asian Version (PS5)
  • Raiden NOVA (PS5, PS4, Switch) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (PS5, PS4, Switch)
  • Shogun Showdown (PS5, Switch) – Already available digitally worldwide.
    • Asian Version (PS5, Switch)
  • Wolf Fang / Skull Fang Saturn Tribute Boosted (PS5, Switch)
    • Limited Edition (PS5, Switch)

Digital-Only

  • Aero the Acro-Bat: Rascal Rival Revenge (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Albatroz (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
  • Blasphemous II Downloadable Content “Mea Culpa” (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • CAFE 0 ~The Sleeping Beast~ REMASTERED (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Clock Tower: Rewind (Xbox Series, Xbox One, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Defense Master (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dragon Age: The Veilguard (PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Farmagia (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Fruitbus (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered (PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Legends of Heropolis DX (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Life is Strange Double Exposure (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Monospaced Lovers (PS5, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Moon Mystery (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Neptunia Game Maker R:Evolution (Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (Xbox Series)
    • European Version (Xbox Series)
  • Phasmophobia Early Access (PS5, PS VR2, Xbox Series) – Launching worldwide.
  • Raiden NOVA (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • [REDACTED] (PS5, Xbox Series, PC [Steam, Epic Games Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Red Dead Redemption (PC [Steam, Epic Games Store, Rockstar Store]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Retreat to Enen (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4) – Launching worldwide.
  • Shadow of the Damned: Hella Remastered (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Slime 3K: Rise Against Despot (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Legends of the Zone Trilogy (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • SULFUR Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Totally Spies! Cyber Mission (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5, Switch)
    • European Version (PS5, PS4, Switch)
  • Triangle Strategy (Quest 2, Quest 3) – Launching worldwide.
  • Wolf Fang / Skull Fang Saturn Tribute Boosted (PS4, Xbox One, PC [Steam])
  • Vampire Hunters (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.

The PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch titles listed above can be purchased through Japanese PlayStation Network and Nintendo accounts using prepaid cards:

  • PlayStation Store cards (yen): 1,100 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 10,000
  • Nintendo eShop cards (yen): 1,000 / 1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 9,000

item.title: Otome visual novel La storia della Arcana Famiglia: Rinato announced for Switch, PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/otome-visual-novel-la-storia-della-arcana-famiglia-rinato-announced-for-switch-pc

  • PC
  • Switch

Ported version of 2015-released PS Vita game.

Publisher dramatic create and developer HuneX have announced otome visual novel port La storia della Arcana Famiglia: Rinato for Switch and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2025 in Japan.

La storia della Arcana Famiglia first launched for PlayStation Portable on October 27, 2011, followed by PS Vita as La storia della Arcana Famiglia: Ancora on December 23, 2015. La storia della Arcana Famiglia: Rinato is a ported version of La storia della Arcana Famiglia: Ancora.

Here is the story synopsis, via VNDB:

The heroine spent her childhood days in a lonely, remote place with her mother, Sumire, and her servant / subordinate, Luca. The Christmas she turned 16, she was invited to go and live together with her father, Mondo.

The dream she had ever since she was young was to live a happy life with her family together. Thus, with her long-yearned-for dream coming true, she took her first steps as a member of “Arcana Famiglia,” a vigilante organization the frank Mondo is in control of.

The story takes place three months after that, on April 1.

Visit the official website here.

item.title: STEINS;GATE RE:BOOT announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/steinsgate-reboot-announced

Due out in 2025 in Japan.

MAGES. announced visual novel STEINS;GATE RE:BOOT for unspecified platforms during the STEINS;GATE series’ 15th anniversary concert “STEINS;GATE 15th Live: One World.” It will launch in 2025 in Japan.

A reboot of the 2009-released Science Adventure series game, STEINS;GATE RE:BOOT will feature new graphics and some additional story elements.

Watch the teaser trailer below.

Teaser Trailer

Artwork

item.title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves adds Kim Dong Hwan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/fatal-fury-city-of-the-wolves-adds-kim-dong-hwan

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Kick into high gear.

SNK has released a new trailer for Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves featuring playable character Kim Dong Hwan (voiced by Jerron Bacat in English, Eiji Takeuchi in Japanese).

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in early 2025.

Watch the trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Kim Dong Hwan Trailer
